summary: This document contains due diligence research results performed on Southern Trust Company, Inc. as part of AML compliance. The findings indicate no alerts or negative media associated with the company, and it outlines the necessary steps for compliance and review.

persons.name: Himanshu Khatwani
persons.context: Himanshu Khatwani prepared the due diligence report on Southern Trust Company, Inc.

keyFacts: The due diligence report found no alerts or negative media associated with Southern Trust Company, Inc.
The report was prepared by Himanshu Khatwani on August 21, 2018.
The document emphasizes the importance of compliance and review processes for any alerts.
There were no court cases or public records found related to the company.
The document is marked as confidential and for internal use only.
